analysis.summary: NDA between YOOBROO, INC. and TONY LIU requires signatures from both parties with date and initials. The document has an effective date of 2025-06-30. Both parties need to complete signature fields including full signature, date of signing, and initials on designated pages.
insights: This is a bilateral NDA requiring signatures from both YOOBROO, INC. (likely through an authorized representative) and TONY LIU as an individual
The effective date (2025-06-30) is in the future, suggesting this is a forward-dated agreement that will become active on that date regardless of when signed
Initials requirement indicates the document likely has multiple pages requiring acknowledgment
Corporate entity YOOBROO, INC. will need an authorized signatory with proper authority to bind the company
recommendations: Execute signatures in this order: 1) YOOBROO, INC. authorized representative signs first as the disclosing party, 2) TONY LIU signs second as the receiving party
YOOBROO, INC. fields required: Authorized signature, printed name, title, date of signing, initials on each page
TONY LIU fields required: Signature, printed name, date of signing, initials on each page
Ensure YOOBROO, INC. signatory has documented authority (board resolution or delegation of authority) to execute NDAs on behalf of the company
Both parties should retain fully executed copies with all pages initialed
Consider using electronic signature platform with audit trail for remote execution and timestamp verification
Verify all initials are present on each page before final execution to avoid incomplete agreement
